article.headline: Elon 80, UNC-Greensboro 72
article.story: GREENSBORO, N.C. -- Lucas Troutman and Jack Isenbarger scored 19 points each and Elon defeated UNC Greensboro 80-72 on Monday night. The Phoenix (6-2, 2-0 Southern Conference) outscored the Spartans 32-22 in the paint and, led by Isenbarger, 31-22 off the bench. Troutman was 8 of 9 from the field as Elon shot 50 percent for the game (30 of 60), going 8 of 20 from long range (40 percent). Sebastian Koch added 20 points for the Phoenix, who won their third in a row overall, and fourth straight against UNC Greensboro. The Phoenix have now opened the season with their best record since 1991-92. Trevis Simpson led the Spartans (2-7, 0-3) with 27 points. Korey Van Dussen added 13 points for the Spartans, who begin SoCon play 0-3 for the first time since 2003-04.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
